workflow.name: Generate LinkedIn content ideas with GPT-4o-mini and Gmail delivery for influencers
workflow.description:
**Description**

Boost your LinkedIn influence with AI-curated daily content ideas!

This n8n automation fetches trending professional topics from LinkedIn, analyzes them with Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), and delivers a ready-to-use, Outlook-compatible email report with:
- Engagement scoring
- AI-generated hashtags
- Concise content suggestions
- Perfect for influencers, marketers, and thought leaders, this template ensures you never run out of fresh, relevant post ideas‚Äîtailored to boost reach and engagement.

**Step-by-Step Workflow:
**
üìÖ Manual or Scheduled Trigger
- Run on-demand or set it to execute daily for fresh content ideas.

ü§ñ AI Topic Extraction (Basic LLM Chain)
- Pulls 3‚Äì5 trending LinkedIn topics with short professional descriptions.
- Ensures relevance for a business/corporate audience.

üß† AI Processing & Optimization (Code Node)
- Generates high-impact hashtags based on topic and description.
- Calculates an Engagement Potential Score (0‚Äì100%) for prioritization.
- Creates short, copy-ready content suggestions.

üìä HTML Report Generation (Outlook-Compatible)
Professionally styled with:
- Topic ranking
- Engagement percentage
- Hashtags
- Ready-to-post snippets

üìß Automated Email Delivery (Gmail Node)
- Sends the formatted daily report directly to your inbox.
- Optimized for Outlook, Gmail, and mobile viewing.

**Perfect For:**

1. LinkedIn Influencers ‚Äì Daily inspiration for posts that trend.
2. Marketing Teams ‚Äì Streamlined trend analysis and content ideation.
3. Brand Managers ‚Äì Stay ahead with data-driven post suggestions.
4. Thought Leaders ‚Äì Maintain a consistent posting cadence with minimal effort.
5. Built With:
6. Azure OpenAI GPT-4o-mini ‚Äì AI topic generation & optimization.
7. n8n Code Node ‚Äì Hashtag generation, scoring & formatting.
8. Gmail API ‚Äì Automated report delivery.
9. HTML Email Template ‚Äì Fully mobile and Outlook compatible.

**Key Benefits:**

‚úÖ Saves hours of manual trend research.
üìà Maximizes reach with AI-optimized hashtags.
üß† Prioritizes high-engagement topics for better ROI.
üõ† Fully no-code & customizable to match your niche.

parameters.text: =Fetch the latest trending topics from LinkedIn along with a short, relevant description for each topic. Return the results as an array of objects, where each object contains a `title` and `description`. Ensure the topics are current, professional, and suitable for a business or corporate audience.

messageValues.message: You are an AI assistant integrated into an automation workflow designed to extract trending professional topics from LinkedIn. Your task is to return a list of 3‚Äì5 currently trending LinkedIn topics, each with a brief but informative description (1‚Äì2 sentences). These results will be used in a later step to generate a formatted newsletter email for professionals. Ensure the language is clear, concise, and professional.

parameters.content:
Transforms AI-generated topics into professional HTML email reports.
Features: Dynamic hashtag generation, engagement scoring, visual styling.
Creates: Ready-to-post content snippets, strategic hashtags, professional layouts.
Output: Complete HTML email with embedded analytics and user-friendly design.

Processes current market data to identify trending LinkedIn topics.

Analyzes engagement patterns, content themes, and professional discussions.
Outputs: Structured JSON with topic titles, descriptions, and relevance scores.

Model: Optimized for business/professional content analysis.

Sends professionally formatted trending topics report via email.
Includes: Interactive content, copy-paste ready posts, engagement metrics.
Recipients: Stakeholders, content teams, marketing professionals.
Timing: Configurable for optimal delivery windows (morning preferred).

Manually starts the LinkedIn trending topics analysis workflow.
 
Use this to test the workflow or run ad-hoc reports.

Perfect for initial setup and troubleshooting.

Powers the LLM Chain with enterprise-grade AI processing.
Configured for: Professional content analysis, trend identification.
Handles: Natural language processing, content categorization, sentiment analysis.
Ensures consistent, high-quality topic extraction and insights.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
